content.rendered:
ICON (ICX) Price Chart

The ICON’s ICO ended back in October 2017 and in January 2018, the ICON (ICX) coin price hit its all-time-high by reaching more than $12 USD per 1 ICX.

However, since then, the ICON (ICX) coin price gradually slipped down to $0,12 USD and since November 2018 price has never exceeded the threshold of $0,44.There are several reasons for this, but the main one — the cryptocurrency winter that affected the whole cryptocurrency market.

ICON (ICX) Price Prediction 2020

Given the fact that ICON (ICX) is welcomed by the Korean government and the project’s total supply is limited by 800 460 000 assets, it’s just a matter of time when the coin returns to its past marks.

To see how far the ICX coin price can go, we’ve collected several the most perspective ICON (ICX) price predictions:

Coin Bureau ICON (ICX) Price Prediction

Сryptocurrency analysis-focused YouTube channel Coin Bureau states the project is “a solid one, however, I worry about how much competition it has.”

It’s worth noting that South Korea is a blockchain-friendly country which means ICON won’t see as much resistance from a local perspective. 

“Overall, the ICON project has potential,” Coin Bureau concluded.

Changelly ICON (ICX) Price Prediction

The well-known cryptocurrency exchange service Changelly says ICON (ICX) is “a great long-term investment that might bring you considerable profits in 2-4 years.” 

However, at this time, ICX will reportedly keep somewhere between $0,19 — $0.45. The exchange claims it’s unlikely that ICON (ICX) coin price will exceed $1 level in the middle-term perspective as the cryptocurrency market is still far from starting the recovery.

Mineable ICON (ICX) Price Prediction

Cryptocurrency-focused YouTube channel Mineable listed ICX in Top-5 altcoins to keep an eye on. “ICON has tremendous potential in achieving wide adoption in the country and beyond.” The channel claims the project may be the only one in the industry that’s already getting substantial revenue coming in.

Pantera Capital ICON (ICX) Price Prediction

The very first U.S. Bitcoin investment firm Pantera Capital is pretty hyped on the ICON project. The firm participated in the ICO in 2017 and in July 2019, it’s even hiddenly invested approximately $1 billion USD in ICX. Considering such a big inflow, it’s worth keeping an eye on how far things will go.

CoinSwitch ICON (ICX) Price Prediction

A cryptocurrency exchange aggregator platform CoinSwitch believes the year 2020 is going to be “fruitful for ICON (ICX).” According to CoinSwitch, the ICX coin price might even reach $6.69 by the third quarter of the year and by December, it can touch the $7 mark.

ICON (ICX) Price Prediction Verdict

ICON is a true “sleeping giant” that is right about to wake up. The company has already signed an enormous amount of partnerships not only with Korean companies & government but with the overseas’ as well. Samsung even integrated ICON’s technology “CHAIN ID” onto its phones which means that the project has a lot of technical potentials to expand.

ICON is a rare example of a project that has ongoing business relationships (Pantera Capital, Samsung, SBI, CRYPTO BAZAR) with a fleet of billion-dollar companies but still suffers a lack of increased attention.

What is ICON (ICX)?

ICON (ICX) is the largest South Korean blockchain-based ecosystem. By its scale, the project can simply compete with such mammoths as EOS (EOS), TRON (TRX) or Ethereum (ETH). ICON is a decentralized network that aims to connect various blockchains together. As of December 2019, the total market cap of the coin is over $66M USD in ICX (over 9,000 Bitcoins). 

The coin takes sixty-fourth place in the top 100 cryptocurrencies in the world by market cap.

The daily trading volume of the cryptocurrency is over $3,7M USD or 531 Bitcoins (BTC). 

Over the past three months, the coin price has been bouncing in the fixed frames from $0,25 USD down to $0,13 USD and vice-versa. 

The current ICX price is staying at $0,13 USD (or 0,00001789 BTC) per 1 ICX.

Despite the fact this coin is actively adopting by the Seoul government, the ICX coin price lost over 9000% since January 2018, which means that the coin has almost reached its bottom and is sleeping until the next bull run.

You can hodl and exchange the ICON (ICX) in Atomic Wallet, a secure decentralized crypto wallet not only for traditional assets like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) but also for the other 500+ tokens.

ICON (ICX) Blockchain

The ICON team has developed a large independent platform that makes it possible for various independent blockchains to interact with each other using smart contracts. 

By existing within the ICON Republic, crypto-communities are united with each other thanks to the loopchain technology. 

The main goal of the ICON (ICX) project is to build a platform on which financial, healthcare, security, insurance, healthcare, commercial, educational and other players could co-exist and conduct transactions on a single network.

How to buy ICON (ICX)

Since ICX is based on its own Mainnet, it’s currently not possible to purchase it directly via a Simplex payment processor. However, you can simply buy Bitcoin or Ethereum via a credit card and after that exchange any of these cryptocurrencies for ICX. 

To do so, download the app and pass the verification process (photo ID is obligatory to confirm your identity) to start hodling today.

How to exchange ICON (ICX)

The ICX coin can easily be swapped through a native exchange that is integrated into the Atomic Wallet. The wallet supports 300+ ERC20-based tokens and other prominent cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Tezos (XTZ) and many more.
